name: Fateholders of Tetsoidea
description: A fun and charming RPG containing all of the good RPG elements with no bells and whistles.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 295 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
